text:
Chapter 8:
At the End of the World...
An almost roaring scream, indescribable in any way.

It was the voice of the giant monster, its body slashed in many places,
no longer able to conceal the light leaking from within.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Ugh, haa... haa.
Is that... the monster's
core light, perhaps?

name: Barte
text:
Yeah... the aura is flowing towards that sphere.
No doubt about it!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Tch, we're doing this with four of us
and there's still a thin layer left?
What a pain...!

options.text: If only we can destroy that core...!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Just as boss says!
Conversely, we've come this far
against such a giant monster!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Indeed.
At first, I wondered what would happen.
As expected of Danzo-sama, you are so positive.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Tch, what a pain in the neck.
It keeps absorbing nutrients from the air,
so it recovers no matter how much we wound it.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
...Well. That's precisely why
I've been carving into it at a speed
that surpasses its recovery.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
But it looks like its nutrient supply
is finally unable to keep up!
The wounds are exposed too, right?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
If we keep up this saturated attack,
we'll be able to directly attack the core!
Then...

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Huh?
Wait a minute...

Danzo noticed a certain anomaly.
It was gradually spreading around the battered monster.

Like tree roots stretching out...
Lines of light, forming a net-like pattern, rapidly extended outwards,
instantly spreading across the entire sky.

options.text: The crack spread... no, that's not it!

text:
The presence of the monster that [Player] had perceived
had already spread across the entire area where its "roots" were established.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Huh...? What—!?
What are those roots like!?
What's that thing doing now...!?

name: Barte
text:
—! Hey!
Look, everyone!
The monster's wounds...!

The monster's wounds, which everyone had risked their lives to inflict so far—
Gradually faded, covering the core.

Each time, the sound of glass shattering
resounded from all directions.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
You're kidding, right...?
What is that thing absorbing
from those roots...?

name: Gnomon
text:
—!?
Eh, warning...!?

At that moment, Gnomon's staff emitted a warning sound,
and a red-tinged window appeared before Gnomon's eyes.

That was—something that would only appear
because he held administrator privileges
over the Ether pump that covered the "rift".

name: Gnomon
text:
...The Ether pump.
It restarted, then went silent.
And it's decreasing...

name: Gnomon
text:
Could it be that this monster...
Is starting to absorb not just the biomachines in the atmosphere,
but the Ether pump too...!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Ether pump...!?
That's the lid-like thing that covered the "rift", right!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Why would that be nutrition!?
Gnomon, explain!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...The Ether pump's power source is the incoming Ether.
Its principle is similar to a hydroelectric power's waterwheel.

name: Gnomon
text:
It operates using the energy generated when drawing in Ether—
And stores the surplus energy internally.

name: Gnomon
text:
That is then used as an energy source during restart.
In other words... it contains Ether crystal shards of microscopic size.

options.text: I see, it eats Ether crystal shards too...!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
W-Wait a minute! In that case, wouldn't it be an opportunity for us,
since the exposed surface of the "rift" is expanding!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Because, the reason we were trying to defeat that thing
was because it was blocking the exit to outer space!

name: Gnomon
text:
...No, unfortunately, that won't happen.
What covers the "rift" has been replaced
from the Ether pump to the monster's "roots".

name: Gnomon
text:
Unless we defeat this monster, which continues its abnormal recovery...
We won't be able to leave this universe.

name: Gnomon
text:
...This monster, currently feeding on the astronomically multiplied
ether crystal-infused nanomachine.

name: Barte
text:
That's... too unfair!
Alright, if those "roots" are restoring it,
then I'll cut them all down—

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Wait!
Isn't that thing starting to make a sphere of light...!?

The self-recovering monster began to form a sphere
of intensely glowing energy
at its sharply pointed tip.
The sphere gradually swelled up, and then...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Everyone, gather around!
Incantation omitted, emergency defense!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text: [Player]-sama, here!!

The moment [Player] was instantly embraced by Danzo
and hidden behind Gnomon's back,
A powerful beam of light was fired at the group.

Gnomon's barrier cracked with a creaking sound,
but somehow was still capable of holding itself.

The flash that sped past the group
exploded far behind them on the ground.
A fierce explosion erupted in Endaira.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
What the heck...!
This is a real weapon now,
it's horrible!

The hem of [Player]'s clothes, which had been sticking out from the barrier,
had vanished as if it had been cut off.

options.text: A monster shooting such a pure attack!?
W-What about the people on the ground...!?

name: Barte
text:
...From where the pillar of fire rose,
aura is flowing towards it.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
So, the guys who were at the explosion site
weren't burned, but eaten, huh...
You bastard!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
This is seriously bad...!
Somehow, we have to cut off that monster's
energy supply route!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Not just us—
It's going to gobble up this entire world!?

name: Gnomon
text:
What do I do... what do I do!?
Think... think...!

Gnomon desperately tried to calm his panicking mind,
and pondered.

options.text: But how to cover such a wide area...?
We don't have time to go and cut down those "roots"...

text:
—At that moment.
Around [Player],
something sounded like it was flickering.

The source of the sound was that transparent "chain".
Before they knew it, it had faintly taken on a dark hue,
becoming visible.

The "chain", stretching straight beyond the monster's formed
net-like "roots", was shaking constantly.

—As if.
Something heavy was pressing down
on the tightly stretched "chain".

At that moment, something like an unidentifiable cry
resounded in [Player]'s head.

It was more like the sound of wind whistling
through an empty space, rather than something emitted by a living creature.

—And then. What struck the "chain"...
The owner of the voice.
Appeared, tearing through the net.

It was like a snake.
Devoid of any element of life,
yet still like a living being.

Such was the anomalous form of the monster,
clad in jet-black flames.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
O-Oh!?
What is that, a new enemy!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...No. Eh, no way...!?
It's smaller than when I saw it before, but—
That's Exio's, isn't it!!

name: Barte
text:
W-What the hell!?
You guys, do you seriously know a monster!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Ah, um... how should I put it.
That's an ID Replica, and...

name: Gnomon
text:
—Look!
That monster, its "roots"...!

The very small snake-shaped monster—
ID Replica, circled around the giant monster.

Every time the "roots" touched the jet-black flames it harbored,
the "roots" were severed one after another and vanished.

As if, instead, it was sucking up the nutrients
that the monster should have been getting from the "roots".

options.text: Oh right, because it's a monster too...!

text:
The rotation axis of the continuously rotating giant monster
began to waver. As if it were writhing in pain.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
W-What an awful sight...!
A monster is devouring parts of another monster at an incredible speed.

name: Barte
text:
But... isn't this our chance!?
Its recovery has stopped! It can't recover at explosive speeds like before!

Having devoured the monster's "roots" and seemingly satisfied,
ID Replica flew towards [Player] and the others.

And then, it began to circle
around [Player] and the others.

name: Gnomon
text:
—[Player]-sama.
This monster is...?
Is it an ally...?

options.text: I don't think it's an enemy... probably.
Well, it belongs to someone we know...

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
At this point, I don't care whose it is!
Thank you, ID Replica!
Thanks to you, our pinch isn't a pinch anymore!

As if reacting to Hydoor's words,
ID Replica made a gesture as if tilting its head.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Indeed, the situation has improved greatly, but...
Back to square one, huh—well!
I guess we have no choice but to do something about it!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
The task is the same!
We just need to cut it up again
with enough force to overcome its slowed recovery!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Tch, this is annoying, but... I guess there's no helping it!
Let's finish this quickly!!

name: Barte
text:
Yeah...! It's strange,
I've been cutting so many enemies,
but the blade's sharpness hasn't dulled at all!

name: Barte
text:
With this—
I can forge and wield as many weapons
as I want!

name: Gnomon
text:
What does that mean?
The source of power for Parallel Weapons,
was it energy converted from observation count?

name: Gnomon
text:
Come to think of it, no matter how many material coins
I consume, they don't seem to run out...
—[Player]-sama.

options.text: How many people are watching, I wonder?
Is the broadcast even working in the first place...?

text:
[Player] checked the streaming app screen
on their device, which should have been relaying the broadcast.
Then—

name: Notification
text:
Energy supply exceeds maximum measurable amount.
Energy conversion processing is being performed sequentially,
please wait.

name: Notification
text:
Estimated observers—
Approximately 1 trillion, 215 billion, 182 million people.

options.text: It's not just the people of Endaira, is it?

name: Gnomon
text:
.........
It far exceeds the current population
of Planet Endaira.

name: Gnomon
text:
Could it be that through the interstellar network...
It's being transmitted to other surviving planets...!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Wow, seriously—!?
That means we're the center of attention
across this entire universe!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
N-No wonder the blades never chipped at all.
Besides, the numbers are so absurd
I can't even imagine it anymore.

name: Barte
text:
So people from various planets are cheering us on...!
Amazing, it's too amazing!!

options.text: With this, we can use any attack!
Well, the fate of the world is at stake, after all!
The broadcast is actually working, that's good.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player]-sama is calm.
I need to learn from you more.

name: Gnomon
text:
Indeed, in this state...
There seems to be no need to worry about
energy or material coin consumption...!

name: Gnomon
text:
.........
No, but still, we cannot completely say
that we have the upper hand yet.

name: Gnomon
text:
The enemy has absorbed the Ether pump.
If it restarted inside the monster's body,
until it is digested and vanishes—

name: Gnomon
text:
It will continue to supply Ether, which has been crystallized into shards, to the monster, meaning energy.
As long as that limit is unknown...

Gnomon, who had spoken that far,
suddenly stopped talking.

name: Gnomon
text:
...No, wait.
Conversely, if the Ether pump is restarting inside,
we might be able to use that too...

Gnomon pondered, head down, with his hand on his chin for a while.
Then, he looked up, and faced the group with a serious expression.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Everyone.
When the enemy's defense weakens and it begins to recover...
There's something I want to try.

name: Gnomon
text:
It will require a bit of time for coin insertion and chanting...
Will that be alright?
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

text: [Trigger condition: Enemy HP falls below 20%]

name: Gnomon
text:
The light of the core is visible—
The Ether pump's reaction is increasing.

name: Gnomon
text:
I knew it......!
The Ether pump is still alive inside that thing!

options.text: Its recovery has begun, now's our chance!

name: Gnomon
text:
Thank you for waiting, here I go!
—Cost 256, Ether pump
operation authority obtained, re-login confirmed!

name: Gnomon
text:
Command from administrator!
Ether pump—
All units reverse thrust, maximum duration 60 seconds!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh......!?
Is it really that effective!?
That guy's writhing!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
It seems he was counting on it quite a bit!
He's weakened enough to be visibly noticeable!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Success!
However, did we took too much time...!?
The "rift" is going to swallow this planet!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
...No problem at all!!
It's just a matter of cutting this guy down right now, isn't it!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
All of you, lend me your strength!!
And then—follow me!!
We'll rush out to the edge of the universe in one go!!

name: Barte
text:
—Understood, Hydoor!
For now, I'll polish your sword... into the best weapon in this universe!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text: OK, leave it to me, Hydoor!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text: I'll play so hard my arms feel like they're tearing off!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Please, I'm counting on you all!
A future for this universe!!

options.text: Cut it down in one fell swoop!!
